name: The Joy of Painting
overview: The Joy of Painting was an American television show hosted by painter Bob Ross that taught its viewers techniques for landscape oil painting. Although Ross could complete a painting in half an hour, the intent of the show was not to teach viewers "speed painting". Rather, he intended for viewers to learn certain techniques within the time that the show was allotted. The show began on January 11, 1983, and lasted until May 17, 1994, a year before Ross' death.

episodes.name: A Walk in the Woods
episodes.overview: Bob Ross introduces us to his "Almighty" assortment of tools and colors, tells us that anyone can paint, and creates a landscape of a forest path just after a rain shower.

episodes.name: Mt. McKinley
episodes.overview: This episode remains unaired and was provided only to various TV stations to determine their interest in the show.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Season 1 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: A Walk in the Woods, Mt. McKinley, Ebony Sunset, Winter Mist, Quiet Stream, Winter Moon, Autumn Mountains, Peaceful Valley, Seascape, Mountain Lake, Winter Glow, and Snowfall.

episodes.name: Meadow Lake
episodes.overview: Glide into this scenic world of green trees and bushes reflecting into calm waters. Bob Ross paints both gentle beauty and almighty power.

episodes.name: Winter Sun
episodes.overview: Find the glistening sun peeking through the trees in this wintery scene; Bob Ross creates a cold day warmed by daystar radiance.

episodes.name: Ebony Sea
episodes.overview: As the night settles over a rocky coast, Bob Ross gives you a warm glow still in the sky – a painting achieved on black canvas.

episodes.name: Shades of Grey
episodes.overview: Bundle up and endure the cold weather in this snow filled adventure; Bob Ross paints a wintry mountain scene using only Grey and White tones.

episodes.name: Autumn Splendor
episodes.overview: The fall breeze rustles in the trees as you rest your feet in crisp still waters. Discover the joys of nature in this Bob Ross painting.

episodes.name: Black River
episodes.overview: In this painting Bob Ross emphasizes a slow river winding around colorful foliage, with the final embers of sunlight ahead.

episodes.name: Brown Mountain
episodes.overview: Swim in the warm water, nap in the luxurious green grass – today Bob Ross creates a wonderful summer mountain scene.

episodes.name: Reflections
episodes.overview: Truly picture perfect. A bright day and still water combine to make amazing mirrored images throughout this Bob Ross mountain masterpiece.

episodes.name: Black and White Seascape
episodes.overview: An approaching storm and dramatic sky set the mood for this unique seascape. Bob Ross uses a canvas painted half black and half white.

episodes.name: Lazy River
episodes.overview: Take a relaxing walk with Bob Ross through a bright green grassy forest, where a smooth crystal waterway flows so, so quietly.

episodes.name: Black Waterfall
episodes.overview: Hear the sounds of a bubbling stream and distant waterfall against the most tumultuous of all skies; a spectacular Bob Ross painting.

episodes.name: Mountain Waterfall
episodes.overview: Slip away into a wondrous plush green forest where Bob Ross creates an almost invisible mountain overlooking a falling stream.

episodes.name: Final Grace
episodes.overview: Beautiful foliage and fierce skies with an almighty mountain overlooking a calm lake. Watch Bob Ross paint this challenging scene.

episodes.name: Mountain Retreat
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints a beautiful summer getaway with rugged brown peaks, clear blue waters and a cozy little cabin too.

episodes.name: Blue Moon
episodes.overview: Breathtaking skies, bending palms and waves that accentuate the cool night breeze. A one-of-a-kind masterpiece by Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Bubbling Stream
episodes.overview: In the midst of the forest flows a stream that splashes and trickles endlessly along – Bob Ross depicts the true beauty of nature.

episodes.name: Winter Night
episodes.overview: Bob Ross captures the stillness of cold darkness and rests a cozy little cabin atop a snow covered hill – a real black canvas favorite.

episodes.name: Distant Hills
episodes.overview: Far, far away there rests a mountain nestled in misty clouds and foothills. Bob Ross creates a scene using soft, brilliant colors.

episodes.name: Covered Bridge
episodes.overview: Enjoy this Bob Ross scene that includes luxurious green foliage and an old weathered trestle-bridge placed lovingly amongst all the beauty.

episodes.name: Quiet Inlet
episodes.overview: Sneak away into the sounds of quiet waters, velvety green shrubs and distance foothills. Bob Ross creates a perfect scene of relaxation.

episodes.name: Night Light
episodes.overview: In this dark breathtaking scene, Bob Ross creates an almost calm night with waves crashing against rocks and protective lighthouse.

episodes.name: The Old Mill
episodes.overview: Journey into the country with Bob Ross and watch how he creates this magnificent painting by adding a large old mill into the heart of the forest.

episodes.name: Campfire
episodes.overview: In this one-of-a-kind masterpiece, Bob Ross paints a vibrant golden red glow, complete with cowboy restin’ a while by the cracklin’ flames.

episodes.name: Rustic Barn
episodes.overview: A beautiful fall scene -- Bob Ross uses the colors of nature to settle an old worn-down farm building into soft golden grassy bushes and trees.

episodes.name: Hidden Lake
episodes.overview: Beneath a soft purple mountain range, lots of trees and bushes surround a secret little lake, as only Bob Ross can create on canvas.

episodes.name: Peaceful Waters
episodes.overview: Talented guest artist Steve Ross creates clear blue skies, an almighty mountain and lake lined generously with trees and bushes.

3.overview: Season 3 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Mountain Retreat, Blue Moon, Bubbling Stream, Winter Night, Distant Hills, Covered Bridge, Quiet Inlet, Night Light, The Old Mill, Campfire, Rustic Barn, Hidden Lake, and Peaceful Waters.

episodes.name: Purple Splendor

episodes.name: Tranquil Valley

episodes.name: Winter Sawscape
episodes.overview: Something new and different -- paint a wintry country scene on a wooden sawblade with guest artist Dorothy Dent.

episodes.name: Evening Seascape
episodes.overview: Feel the cool breeze and admire the beauty of turbulent waves, jagged cliffs and dark night skies -- Bob Ross paints a west coast seascape.

episodes.name: Warm Summer Day

episodes.name: Cabin in the Woods

episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes you on a journey through the majestic forest where you can smell the sweet aroma of pines and taste cool mist in the air.

episodes.name: Northwest Majesty
episodes.overview: Tall leafy trees, almighty mountains and puffy white clouds; a fresh and innovative painting by guest artist Diane Andre.

episodes.name: Autumn Days
episodes.overview: In the still of the night, trees reflect off the glistening pond and cool breeze of blows as Bob Ross takes you on this black canvas adventure.

episodes.name: Mountain Challenge
episodes.overview: Here it is! Impressive skies, misty waters and snowy mountains – completed by Bob Ross using just his specially designed painting knife!

episodes.name: Anatomy of a Wave
episodes.overview: Guest Artist Joyce Ortner captures the true beauty of the ocean waves, blue and enchanting in this breathtaking seascape masterpiece.

episodes.name: The Windmill
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a proud strong windmill, standing in watch beside old farm buildings where happy little animals lay still in the night.

episodes.name: Autumn Glory
episodes.overview: In this landscape Bob Ross paints a far away mountain snuggled in with bright green trees and bushes mirrored in glistening waters.

episodes.name: Indian Girl
episodes.overview: Guest artist Ferne Sirois shares her own Native American heritage in this adorable portrait of a playful, smiling little child.

episodes.name: Meadow Stream
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints a beautiful summer scene today – rushing little riverlet flowing through the luscious greenery of a cabin landscape.

episodes.overview: Luscious green grass and fresh evergreens, purple and pink sky -- giving the water a perfect glow in this Bob Ross black canvas masterpiece.

episodes.overview: Fresh morning lake and succulent evergreens -- watch Bob Ross create a peaceful, dewy brown mountain scene.

episodes.overview: Take a hike with Bob Ross to the southwestern region, see the beauty of fresh skies over sun glistened mountains and silvery mere.

episodes.name: High Chateau
episodes.overview: Uncover a secret little loft hidden in the woods, surrounded by evergreens and ruffly green bushes and grass -- Bob Ross unveils it all!

episodes.name: Country Life
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes us home to the farm -- a big red barn and long rickety wooden fence – capturing our very vivid childhood memories.

episodes.name: Western Expanse
episodes.overview: Powerful clouds, rolling hills and winding river waters -- Bob Ross creates this masterpiece using only his special painting knife.

episodes.name: Marshlands
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes us deep into the southeastern peninsula to create a beautiful scene with still blue waters and bright green mossy trees.

episodes.name: Blaze of Color
episodes.overview: Evening sky sets in, giving way to a perfect glow -- watch a black canvas come to life under the magic brushes of Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Secluded Lake

episodes.name: Evergreens at Sunset
episodes.overview: Using a different technique or two, Bob Ross creates a fascinating scene – watch the sun drop below the horizon, just behind the shadow of trees.

episodes.overview: To capture the innocence of a stream-side cottage, Bob Ross creates a giant mountain standing majestically in the distance.

episodes.name: Barn at Sunset

episodes.overview: It’s almost fall, and Bob Ross captures the undaunted power and charm of a mighty brown mountain surveying its rustic surroundings.

episodes.overview: Talented guest painter Steve Ross shows you how to create a mirror-like lake spanning the width of snowy peaks and foothills.

episodes.overview: Layers and layers of mountains, as far as the eye can see -- Bob Ross shows us the secret to creating a larger-than-life landscape.

episodes.name: Grey Winter

episodes.overview: The field of snow and the little cabin yield to the bright, orange sun -- Bob Ross conveys harmony in this cold, but cozy scene.

episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross as he creates a beautiful snowy landscape with stately evergreens, warmed by winter sun hanging low over distant mountains.

episodes.name: Surf's Up
episodes.overview: Feel the salt spray as Bob Ross paints ocean waves under abundant clouds, rolling in to spend their energy against sand and rock.

episodes.name: Red Sunset
episodes.overview: Warm light in sky and clouds makes this a glowing, fiery landscape -- Bob Ross teaches the use of his technique on black canvas.

episodes.name: Meadow Road
episodes.overview: Majestic snow-covered peaks and evergreens loom over lush green grasslands as Bob Ross takes you into his world of natural beauty.

episodes.name: Winter Oval
episodes.overview: A beautiful mountain painting in an oval – with a surprising twist! – as Bob Ross creates a lonely cabin embraced by lovely lacy bushes.

episodes.name: Secluded Beach
episodes.overview: Bob Ross teaches us the secret of his wet-on-wet technique while creating a restless ocean crashing against a rugged rocky coastline.

episodes.name: Forest Hills
episodes.overview: Strong mountains, proud evergreens and luxurious trees and bushes hug the velvety smooth foothills in today’s Bob Ross masterpiece.

episodes.name: Little House by the Road
episodes.overview: A weathered fence guards a rustic country home shadowed by tall trees as Bob Ross creates another masterpiece in his unique style.

episodes.name: Mountain Path
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross for a happy half-hour as he creates one of his beautiful mountain and evergreen scenes, complete with path and ample bushes.

episodes.name: Country Charm
episodes.overview: Bob Ross brings springtime to the canvas, all around a tiny cabin set in a landscape of hazy green hills and cottony clouds.

episodes.name: Nature's Paradise
episodes.overview: Today Bob Ross creates a fantastic southwestern mountain scene with spectacular red peaks looming over a lazy, tree-lined stream.

episodes.name: Mountain by the Sea
episodes.overview: Majestic mountains reign over a colorful seascape as Bob Ross creates one of the most challenging masterpieces ever painted in a half-hour.

episodes.name: Mountain Hideaway
episodes.overview: Bob Ross employs a unique technique, using both black and white base coats, to create a happy little stream tumbling down a rocky meadow.

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: Season 9 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Winter Evergreens, Surf’s Up, Red Sunset, Meadow Road, Winter Oval, Secluded Beach, Forest Hills, Little House by the Road, Mountain Path, Country Charm, Nature’s Paradise, Mountain by the Sea, and Mountain Hideaway.

episodes.name: Towering Peaks
episodes.overview: A real Bob Ross classic – the majestic snow covered mountain, rolling foothills, leafy trees and bushes and serene lake.

episodes.name: Cabin at Sunset
episodes.overview: Just a few quick, color-filled strokes and a little shanty with crisp evergreens and bright meadow appear – paint with Bob Ross!

episodes.name: Twin Falls
episodes.overview: A mellow background gives way to chunky rock formations, trickling waterways and happy trees in this Bob Ross landscape.

episodes.name: Secluded Bridge
episodes.overview: Take a walk with Bob Ross today, over a sweet old footbridge, across a little creek a’splashin’ through the woodlands.

episodes.name: Ocean Breeze
episodes.overview: Today’s beautiful Bob Ross painting focuses on both an awesome cloudy sky, and a turbulent sea of crashing waves.

episodes.name: Autumn Woods
episodes.overview: A virtual explosion of color as Bob Ross paints blazing orange and gold trees below a ridge of magnificent mountain peaks.

episodes.name: Winter Solitude
episodes.overview: What a delicate view of polar beauty; Bob Ross taps his brushes to make subtle hills, sleeping grasses and leafless trees.

episodes.name: Golden Sunset
episodes.overview: A frozen pond and snow drifts would be so cold, except for the warm rich sky and late autumn foliage in this Bob Ross painting.

episodes.name: Mountain Oval
episodes.overview: Guest painter Steve Ross delights us with his oval landscape – blue skies, frosty mountain, fresh foothills and polished lake.

episodes.name: Ocean Sunset
episodes.overview: The beach is such a lovely sight as afternoon comes to an end – Bob Ross paints this seascape with gold, purple and orange hues.

episodes.name: Triple View
episodes.overview: Prepare the canvas just-so, and in the end you’ll have a Bob Ross landscape -- mighty mountain, homey cabin and meadow -- in a window!

episodes.name: Winter Frost
episodes.overview: A cold mountain-scape, but Bob Ross adds a vibrant sun high in the sky, and your snowy paradise is warm and cozy.

episodes.name: Lakeside Cabin
episodes.overview: Kick off your shoes and let the fragrant grassy meadow tickle your toes – a fantastic Bob Ross summertime landscape to enjoy.

10.name: Season 10
10.overview: Season 10 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Towering Peaks, Cabin at Sunset, Twin Falls, Secluded Bridge, Ocean Breeze, Autumn Woods, Winter Solitude, Golden Sunset, Mountain Oval, Ocean Sunset, Triple View, Winter Frost, and Lakeside Cabin.

episodes.name: Mountain Stream
episodes.overview: A cool blue waterway winds effortlessly from the far away high peaks and evergreens; enjoy today’s Bob Ross landscape.

episodes.name: Country Cabin
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints an old weathered dwelling today, burrowed deep in the snow and lined with protective evergreens.

episodes.name: Daisy Delight
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints a majestic stand of evergreen trees overlooking tiny, sweet little flowers growing on a sloping knoll.

episodes.name: Hidden Stream
episodes.overview: Find yourself in a place just like this on a warm summer day – Bob Ross creates clear sky and shade trees by a nice swimming spot.

episodes.name: Towering Glacier
episodes.overview: An immense ice-draped mountain is Bob Ross’ main focus, with grass covered sloping hills and chipper waterfall too!

episodes.name: Oval Barn
episodes.overview: A happy little winterscape, inside a happy little oval – with homey barn and lacy bushes -- another real Bob Ross classic.

episodes.name: Lakeside Path
episodes.overview: Misty background evergreens and cheerful blue sky give Bob Ross the perfect setting for this lovely birch tree painting.

episodes.name: Sunset Oval
episodes.overview: Bob Ross uses a golden selection of colors in this gorgeous fall mountain scene, all within a cleverly different oval shape on canvas.

episodes.name: Winter Barn
episodes.overview: The soft sky and snow-blanketed ground give this cozy barn a quiet place to sleep and dream awhile; Bob Ross paint brushes make it happen.

episodes.name: Sunset over the Waves
episodes.overview: A fantastic Bob Ross seascape today – enjoy the golden, pink and mauve tones in the sky and crashing waves.

episodes.name: Golden Glow
episodes.overview: Even a tiny shanty by the pond can be a warm place in the dead of winter – Bob Ross shows us how to make a snow scene glow!

episodes.name: Roadside Barn
episodes.overview: Follow the old dirt road to that quaint country barn nestled in nature’s greenery – Bob Ross paints your destination today.

episodes.name: Happy Accident
episodes.overview: Supple sky, fluffy trees and playful rushing river are created by Bob Ross, simply from correcting common mistakes on canvas.

11.name: Season 11
11.overview: Season 11 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Mountain Stream, Country Cabin, Daisy Delight, Hidden Stream, Towering Glacier, Oval Barn, Lakeside Path, Sunset Oval, Winter Barm, Sunset over the Waves, Golden Glow, Roadside Barn, and Happy Accident.

episodes.name: Golden Knoll
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints a beautiful monochromatic scene with delicate leafless trees and rich grassy meadow cuddling a sweet cottage.

episodes.name: Mountain Reflections
episodes.overview: With his trusty brushes, Bob Ross takes us to a beautiful lake hideaway nestled below a towering mountain.

episodes.name: Secluded Mountain
episodes.overview: Spend a relaxing half-hour with Bob Ross as he paints a mountain scene with soft, sloping grass cover, crystal lake and rocky banks.

episodes.name: Bright Autumn Trees
episodes.overview: A real viewer favorite, Bob Ross teaches us how to capture the exciting colors of autumn with trees, trees and trees galore!

episodes.name: Black Seascape
episodes.overview: Watch and learn as Bob Ross creates crashing waves in this moonlit setting – see what a simple black canvas can do.

episodes.name: Steep Mountains
episodes.overview: In this painting, Bob Ross presents a most statuesque ridge of peaks overlooking a little country home by the cove.

episodes.name: Quiet Mountains River
episodes.overview: So quickly, Bob Ross paints this beautiful and peaceful mountain valley – so many layers and layers on the canvas.

episodes.name: Evening Waterfall
episodes.overview: Bob Ross shares with us a truly unique ‘frame’ idea as he creates a fantastic river with rapids on black canvas.

episodes.name: Tropical Seascape
episodes.overview: Palm trees sway in the warm breeze as Bob Ross teaches us to paint a beautiful, sunny exotic little ocean masterpiece.

episodes.name: Mountain at Sunset
episodes.overview: Spend a half-hour with Bob Ross as he demonstrates the creation of the perfect brown-toned mountain scene – warm and wonderful!

episodes.name: Soft Mountain Glow
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ project for today is an almost feathery, tranquil landscape setting at the base of a towering mountain.

episodes.name: Mountain in an Oval
episodes.overview: Watch as Bob Ross treats us to a mountain lake masterpiece enclosed in an oval – with bountiful foliage and bushes bursting out!

episodes.name: Winter Mountain
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ icy-blue mountains, evergreens and lacy-like bush clusters capture the mood of a cold snowy day.

12.name: Season 12
12.overview: Season 12 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Golden Knoll, Mountain Reflections, Secluded Mountain, Bright Autumn Trees, Black Seascape, Steep Mountains, Quiet Mountains River, Evening Waterfall, Tropical Seascape, Mountain at Sunset, Soft Mountain Glow, Mountain in an Oval, and Winter Mountain.

episodes.name: Rolling Hills
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ brushes captivate the graceful and uncommon qualities of distant sloping hills and a peaceful nearby lake.

episodes.name: Frozen Solitude
episodes.overview: A snowy mountain range, an ice-covered lake, and a lost little cabin combine to create a wintry testimony to Bob Ross’ artistic magic.

episodes.name: Meadow Brook
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates an innocent creek that slices its way across a landscape of color in a setting dreams are made of.

episodes.name: Evening at Sunset
episodes.overview: The day’s sun is almost gone, but Bob Ross finds what’s left of it in this unusual blend of late afternoon tones.

episodes.name: Mountain View
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ painting technique is at its best as he shows a rugged group of mountains peering down upon nature’s lovely greenery.

episodes.name: Hidden Creek
episodes.overview: Bob Ross finds and captures on canvas the haunting loveliness of stalwart trees shielding a lonesome brook from the light.

episodes.name: Peaceful Haven
episodes.overview: The undaunted splendor of sky, trees and lake has never been more beautifully portrayed than in this joyful Bob Ross creation.

episodes.name: Mountain Exhibition
episodes.overview: The mountains and the sky sing in harmony as Bob Ross’ brushes tell a story of breathtaking hue and depth.

episodes.name: Emerald Waters
episodes.overview: Bob Ross uses beautiful shades of green that burst forth in this exciting and realistic display of nature’s wonder.

episodes.name: Mountain Summit
episodes.overview: Snowy peaks point toward the heavens as Bob Ross surrounds all of this with a happy gathering of landscape finery.

episodes.name: Cabin Hideaway
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ easy method once again reveals the splendor of a little farm home in a winter wonderland and soft purple hills.

episodes.name: Oval Essence
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ dramatic use of blue tones results in an emotional depiction of stark waves at night – all tucked inside an oval shape.

episodes.name: Lost Lake
episodes.overview: Bob Ross finds a barely visible lake being hugged by snowy mountains and some of nature’s finest greenery.

13.name: Season 13
13.overview: Season 13 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Rolling Hills, Frozen Solitude, Meadow Brook, Evening at Sunset, Mountain View, Hidden Creek, Peaceful Heaven, Mountain Exhibition, Emerald Waters, Mountain Summit, Cabin Hideaway, Oval Essence, and Lost Lake.

episodes.name: Distant Mountains
episodes.overview: Bob Ross will enchant you as he captures, on the canvas, a bright and cheery mountain scene right out of your dreams.

episodes.name: Meadow Brook Surprise
episodes.overview: A timid little brook winds its way through a golden grassland created by Bob Ross’ precise, but easy-to-learn technique.

episodes.name: Mountain Moonlight Oval
episodes.overview: The mysterious night sky is pierced by amazing lunar rays which Bob Ross uses to illuminate a mighty mountain.

episodes.name: Snowy Solitude
episodes.overview: A snow-covered winter fantasy land seems so real, and Bob Ross shows you how easy his special painting technique can be.

episodes.name: Mountain River
episodes.overview: Faraway peaks appear to almost float amongst the clouds as Bob Ross creates a gently flowing river splashing into the foreground.

episodes.name: Graceful Mountains
episodes.overview: Get caught up in the magic as you watch Bob Ross produce a snowy summit and beautiful lake surrounded by shades of greenery.

episodes.name: Windy Waves
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates palm trees that yield to stiff sea breezes as a sky of ominous clouds loom in the background.

episodes.name: On a Clear Day
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ striking color contrasts create a scene that appears to thaw under the bright sun of a late winter’s day.

episodes.name: Riverside Escape Oval
episodes.overview: Share the excitement of discovering a path leading to the edge of a quiet river – in an oval! – with favorite painter Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Surprising Falls
episodes.overview: Guest painter Steve Ross enhances the beauty of this lovely mountain scene with a splashing waterfall amidst lovely fall foliage.

episodes.name: Shadow Pond
episodes.overview: Bob Ross chooses to make a pond in the middle of a darkened forest the subject of today’s mood-evoking creation.

episodes.name: Misty Forest Oval
episodes.overview: The delicate use of beautiful shades of lavender and green makes this glimpse inside a forest, with Bob Ross, an enjoyable challenge.

episodes.name: Natural Wonder
episodes.overview: Bob Ross combines the simple elements of a sky, a mountain, and a lake to produce this ultra-soft tribute to nature.

14.name: Season 14
14.overview: Season 14 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Distant Mountains,Meadow Brook Surprise, Mountain Moonlight Oval, Snowy Solitude, Mountain River, Graceful Mountains, Windy Waves, On a Clear Day, Riverside Escape Oval, Surprising Falls, Shadow Pond, Misty Forest Oval, and Natural Wonder.

episodes.name: Splendor of Winter
episodes.overview: The stillness of a winter’s day, with happy sun shining bright in the sky, can be beautifully captured on canvas, and Bob Ross shows you how.

episodes.name: Colors of Nature
episodes.overview: Bob Ross uses a little imagination and lots of color to create this soft, luxurious early autumn lake scene.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Barn
episodes.overview: Old-time memories are conjured up by the sight of this lonesome big barn that Bob Ross places on the edge of a forest.

episodes.name: Peaceful Reflections
episodes.overview: Bob Ross uncovers the extraordinary loveliness of nature, reflected in the mirror surface of a lake in front of a mountain.

episodes.name: Hidden Winter Moon Oval
episodes.overview: The effective use of striking blue tones allows Bob Ross to produce a winter night scene, complete with sweet cabin, inside an oval!

episodes.name: Waves of Wonder
episodes.overview: The versatility of Bob Ross’ easy method is dramatically illustrated by this mighty tide crashing into a rock-lined shore.

episodes.name: Cabin by the Pond
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a fisherman’s hideaway in the form of a secluded shanty-home nestled beside a smooth little lake.

episodes.name: Fall Stream
episodes.overview: A spunky little river meanders its way through an autumn hillside bursting with splashes of color, as only Bob Ross can create!

episodes.name: Christmas Eve Snow
episodes.overview: Bob Ross gently places a little old church house upon a bed of snow in front of giant frost-covered mountains in the background.

episodes.name: Forest Down Oval
episodes.overview: Bob Ross allows the greenery of a deep grove to be barely visible in the light of early morning – all tucked inside an oval.

episodes.name: Pathway to Autumn
episodes.overview: The splendor of fall is produced by Bob Ross’ red, orange and brown grasses and foliage, softly complimenting a rugged little shed.

episodes.name: Deep Forest Lake
episodes.overview: A dark mere almost completely shielded from the sunlight by a thick growth of soft leafy trees is Bob Ross’ lovely painting today.

episodes.name: Peaks of Majesty
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints a still lake that captures the reflection of some trees as a range of rugged mountains stand guard in the background.

15.name: Season 15
15.overview: Season 15 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Splendor of Winter, Colors of Nature, Grandpa’s Barn, Peaceful Reflections, Hidden Winter Moon Oval, Waves of Wonder, Cabin by the Pond, Fall Stream, Christmas Eve Snow, Forest Down Oval, Pathway to Autumn, Deep Forest Lake, and Peaks of Majesty

episodes.name: Two Seasons
episodes.overview: Take a little walk with Bob Ross as he shows you how to create the same mountain landscape setting in both summer and winter!

episodes.name: Nestled Cabin
episodes.overview: Out of nowhere appears an unexpected find -- a weathered cottage in the deep forest that Bob Ross places there, in an already perfect setting.

episodes.name: Wintertime Discovery
episodes.overview: Imagine stumbling upon this little surprise cabin and shed, nestled in the snow drifts! Bob Ross shows you how easy it is to paint.

episodes.name: Mountain Mirage Wood Shape
episodes.overview: Real or imaginary? It doesn’t matter which as Bob Ross captures a great mountain and forest scene on specially cut plywood!

episodes.name: Double Oval Fantasy
episodes.overview: Bob Ross shows you how two beautiful mountain and evergreen oval scenes can be harmonized into one memorable masterpiece.

episodes.name: Contemplative Lady
episodes.overview: Guest artist John Thamm easily creates a realistic face and head form on a shellacked surface with just a few intriguing strokes.

episodes.name: Deep Woods
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a breathtaking, misty wooded scene with tiny trickling creek that’s fast and easy to recreate.

episodes.name: High Tide
episodes.overview: Bob Ross’ gentle brush strokes create bending palm trees on the edge of a sea coast, just before the water reaches its high point.

episodes.name: Barn in Snow Oval
episodes.overview: You’ll love this super big snow-bundled country structure by Bob Ross – it’s in an oval, and watch for a little surprise too!

episodes.name: That Time of Year
episodes.overview: Steve Ross captures a real ‘dreamscape’ on canvas -- soft rolling hills, birch trees and pretty lake; paint along and add your own touches.

episodes.name: Waterfall Wonder
episodes.overview: One of nature’s perfect creations -- the misty, splashing waterfall -- is painted by Bob Ross, in all its magnificent splendor.

episodes.name: Mighty Mountain Lake
episodes.overview: See the amazing glacier-like peaks Bob Ross creates in this icy panorama; grab your painting knife and do this one too.

episodes.name: Wooded Stream Oval
episodes.overview: Watch and learn as Bob Ross unfolds this beautifully soft wooded scene with gently rippling brook, all inside an oval shape.

16.name: Season 16
16.overview: Season 16 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Two Seasons, Nestled Cabin, Wintertime Discovery, Mountain Mirage Wood Shape, Double Oval Fantasy, Contemplative Lady, Deep Woods, High Tide, Barn in Snow Oval, That Time of Year, Waterfall Wonder, Might Mountain Lake, and Wooded Stream Oval.

episodes.name: Golden Mist Oval
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates an oval scene with warm brown and gold tones that captures the essence of a lonely forest river.

episodes.name: The Old Home Place
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross along the country back roads as he paints a quiet little home on a meadow with a beautiful, serene sky.

episodes.name: Soothing Vista
episodes.overview: Surround yourself with this gorgeous Bob Ross painting; there’s plenty of thick, velvety green grass, trees and foliage to just lose yourself in!

episodes.name: Stormy Seas
episodes.overview: Such magnificent power and vibrant color in the sea and sky! Watch Bob Ross as he tries to tame this beautiful ocean painting.

episodes.name: Country Time
episodes.overview: Looking back to those ‘days of old’, Bob Ross paints a delightful little fishing village with luscious leafy trees in an oval.

episodes.name: A Mild Winter's Day
episodes.overview: Winter scenes don’t have to be cold! With a touch of the sun’s warmth, Bob Ross turns the chill of winter into a golden day.

episodes.name: Spectacular Waterfall
episodes.overview: Grandest of mountains overlooking an incredibly breathtaking waterfall … a Bob Ross painting you must see to believe!

episodes.name: View from the Park
episodes.overview: A tribute to all Bob Ross friends in New York City, this painting is simply full of exciting cut-out shapes and surprises!

episodes.name: Lake View
episodes.overview: For as far as the eye can see -- beautiful rolling hills, birch trees and soft watery reflections; undoubtedly guest artist Steve Ross at his finest.

episodes.name: Old Country Mill
episodes.overview: Rich colors and abundant softness make this such a beautiful Bob Ross painting; detailed mill and waterwheel make it special.

episodes.name: Morning Walk
episodes.overview: Haven’t you always imagined walking through one of Bob Ross’ beautiful landscape paintings? Watch as he makes a dream come true!

episodes.name: Nature's Splendor
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints the very best of nature -- stately evergreens and cool, still waters standing before a glorious brown mountain. A real beauty!

episodes.name: Mountain Beauty
episodes.overview: Guest artist Dana Jester creates a Bob Ross-style mountain scene with dignified foothills and evergreens, and super vibrant bushes.

17.name: Season 17
17.overview: Season 17 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Golden Mist Oval, The Old Home Place, Soothing Vista, Stormy Seas, Country Time, A Mild Winter’s Day, Spectacular Waterfall, View from the Park, Lake View, Old Country Mill, Morning Walk, Nature’s Splendor, and Mountain Beauty.

episodes.name: Half-Oval Vignette
episodes.overview: Bob Ross illustrates the illusion of infinity as mountain and water fade into the distance, created in a lovely half-oval painting.

episodes.name: Absolutely Autumn
episodes.overview: Rich, soft colors prove that fall has arrived! Join Bob Ross as he paints a quiet pond and surrounding foliage preparing themselves for a season of slumber.

episodes.name: Mountain Seclusion
episodes.overview: Travel to a lonely hidden cabin in the frozen mountainous north country with Bob Ross -- another black canvas masterpiece to fall in love with.

episodes.name: Crimson Oval
episodes.overview: Shades of luscious red, lavender and gold surround a bubbling brook flowing through a serene oval painting by television’s favorite painter Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Autumn Exhibition
episodes.overview: Enjoy a casual stroll down the pathway overlooking a quiet pond and breathe in the cool crisp fall air! Bob Ross takes you through this magnificent season.

episodes.name: Majestic Peaks
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross as he paints some of Nature’s most awesome creations – magnificent snow-covered mountains! Beauty you just have to experience.

episodes.name: Golden Morning Mist
episodes.overview: Stroll into the quiet stillness of early daybreak with Bob Ross as he captures the essence of a sun shrouded forest on canvas.

episodes.name: Winter Lace
episodes.overview: Snow-covered trees and shrubs appear to be dressed in finest lace among the soft glows of winter. A unique Bob Ross painting!

episodes.name: Seascape Fantasy
episodes.overview: Such magnificence in sky and sea! Watch the creative brushes of Bob Ross as he paints an ocean view of incredible beauty.

episodes.name: Double Oval Stream
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a gentle brook flowing from one oval to another, under the protective branches and foliage of stately birch trees.

episodes.name: Enchanted Forest
episodes.overview: Enjoy this fascinating experience of watching Bob Ross bring these deep dark woods alive; incredible magic on a partial black canvas.

episodes.name: Southwest Serenity
episodes.overview: Drink in the astonishing beauty of a spectacular desert as you ride down a well traveled road with the amazing brushes of Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Rippling Waters
episodes.overview: A gentle bubbling stream in the midst of the forest – Bob Ross invites you to share the serenity of Nature’s escape with this delightful painting.

18.name: Season 18
18.overview: Season 18 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Half-Oval Vignette, Absolutely Autumn, Mountain Seclusion, Crimson Oval, Autumn Exhibition, Majestic Peaks, Golden Morning Mist, Winter Lace, Seascape Fantasy, Double Oval Stream, Enchanted Forest, Southwest Serenity, and Rippling Waters.

episodes.name: Snowfall Magic
episodes.overview: Experience the mystique of snowflakes gently tumbling in the silence of the forest. Join Bob Ross for this lovely winter masterpiece!

episodes.name: Quiet Mountain Lake
episodes.overview: Relax with Bob Ross as the perfect picnic spot emerges from his paint filled brushes – quiet peaks on a tranquil lake and luscious green velvety grass.

episodes.name: Final Embers of Sunlight
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross into an evening display of glowing, magnificent setting sun. Another unique oval painting you’ll have to see.

episodes.name: Snowy Morn
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross at an old log cabin nestled deep in the powdery woods! An intriguing yet simple painting just beckoning you to paint it yourself.

episodes.name: Camper's Haven
episodes.overview: Warm skies, pleasant valley and purple misty mountains – the perfect place to pitch your tent and enjoy the view with painter Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Waterfall in the Woods
episodes.overview: Drink in the breathtaking beauty of spectacular cascades deep in the timberland. Bob Ross invites you create this astonishing scenic display.

episodes.name: Covered Bridge Oval
episodes.overview: Cross a frozen stream under the shelter of a grand covered bridge and enjoy the tranquility of a beautiful Bob Ross winter’s day.

episodes.name: Scenic Seclusion
episodes.overview: Enjoy the warmth of the day in that quiet spot beside the rippling stream and gentle breezes – Bob Ross creates a painting so vibrant and real.

episodes.name: Ebb Tide
episodes.overview: Leisurely stroll along the beach and breaking wave with Bob Ross and experience the calm of day’s end under a colorful setting sun … in an oval!

episodes.name: After the Rain
episodes.overview: Take a pleasant walk through the forest with Bob Ross and breathe in that crisp, rain-freshened air – but be careful of those puddles!

episodes.name: Winter Elegance
episodes.overview: Even a cold, frozen snowy afternoon can be displayed with signs of astonishing beauty, as portrayed by Bob Ross in this lovely yet simple scene.

episodes.name: Evening's Peace
episodes.overview: Come along with Bob Ross as he creates a winter moon hanging over a snow covered farm nestled among the trees – all on black canvas.

episodes.name: Valley of Tranquility
episodes.overview: Towering mountains protect a lovely green river land, where gentle waters flow and silent breezes blow – another Bob Ross masterpiece to cherish.

19.name: Season 19
19.overview: Season 19 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Snowfall Magic, Quiet Mountain Lake, Final Embers of Sunlight, Snowy Morn, Camper’s Haven, Waterfall in the Woods, Covered Bridge Oval, Scenic Seclusion, Ebb Tide, After the Rain, Winter Elegance, Evening’s Peace, and Valley of Tranquility.

episodes.name: Mystic Mountain
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross as he paints a lovely scenic mountain surrounded by quiet, soft, misty foothills – a beautiful painting that even a beginner can do with ease!

episodes.name: New Day's Dawn
episodes.overview: Visit a quaint little home with Bob Ross and experience the beauty of tender morn in the stillness of the forest; what a delightful painting.

episodes.name: Winter in Pastel
episodes.overview: Lovely soft colors flow from the magnificent brushes of Bob Ross in this lovely warm winter painting … don’t miss seeing this pretty scene unfold.

episodes.name: Hazy Day
episodes.overview: Pick up your brushes and paint along with Bob Ross – he creates a beautiful, rocky stream gently rippling through the forest mist in an oval.

episodes.name: Divine Elegance
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a spectacular mountain scene in a faux matte; a real masterpiece cleverly framed in an intriguing new idea!

episodes.name: Cliffside
episodes.overview: Under the most glorious of skies, enjoy the rhythmic flow of deep sea waters crashing and splashing upon the surrounding rocks and cliffs – Bob Ross style!

episodes.name: Autumn Fantasy
episodes.overview: A painting to reflect the essence of fall, bursting forth in a profusion of brilliant colors as Bob Ross creates a haven of tranquility on canvas.

episodes.name: The Old Oak Tree
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross today as he paints a huge, single stately oak, just on the edge of the forest, its spreading branches and foliage providing comfort and shelter.

episodes.name: Winter Paradise
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a spectacular warm winter painting where snow-covered mountains, trees and bushes lend an alluring sense of beauty in an oval.

episodes.name: Days Gone By
episodes.overview: Travel down an abandoned road with Bob Ross and stumble upon an old weathered barn that has seen better days – what dreams are made of.

episodes.name: Change of Seasons
episodes.overview: Colors transforming, cool breezes and rushing waters – Bob Ross lets his paint brushes do all the talking in the magnificent mountain scene.

episodes.name: Hidden Delight
episodes.overview: Happen upon this sweet cabin in the woods; Bob Ross paints a time-forgotten treasure that comes to life in a soft, warm landscape scene.

episodes.name: Double Take
episodes.overview: Bob Ross presents a really unique idea using black gesso -- two lovely paintings in one -- summer and winter scenes overlapping on the same canvas!

20.name: Season 20
20.overview: Season 20 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Mystic Mountain, New Day’s Dawn, Winter in Pastel, Hazy Day, Divine Elegance, Cliffside, Autumn Fantasy, The Old Oak Tree, Winter Paradise, Days Gone By, Change of Seasons, Hidden Delight, and Double Take.

episodes.name: Valley View
episodes.overview: This beautiful lake in the glen will leave you fully rested and at peace with the world; Bob Ross creates a quiet mountain masterpiece.

episodes.name: Tranquil Dawn
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross on a warm winter morning, the surroundings still undisturbed by Nature’s little creatures; enjoy the freshness of a new day not yet awake.

episodes.name: Royal Majesty
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross to a secluded waterfall deep in the mountains, standing tall and proud. This magnificent scene instills comfort and joy.

episodes.name: Serenity
episodes.overview: Breaking the silence of a misty morning is a rippling brook through the forest. Join Bob Ross as he takes you to this favorite escape.

episodes.name: Cabin at Trail's End
episodes.overview: Take a leisurely hike down a weathered pathway with Bob Ross and happen upon an old cabin; create a beautiful oval painting you can be proud of.

episodes.name: Mountain Rhapsody
episodes.overview: Experience the blissful pleasure of the coldest season under a splendid pastel sky with Bob Ross; enjoy this fabulous mountain masterpiece.

episodes.name: Wilderness Cabin
episodes.overview: Paint along with Bob Ross and discover the beauty of a secluded log home with only quiet pond and rustic trees for companionship.

episodes.name: By the Sea
episodes.overview: Come visit the coast with Bob Ross and paint a glorious ocean-scape; enjoy the solitude and gentle rhythm of the waves caressing the shoreline.

episodes.name: Indian Summer
episodes.overview: Paint along with Bob Ross and discover what autumn beauty unfolds as those exotic orange and gold colors appear on canvas.

episodes.name: Blue Winter
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross to the middle of winter, where shades of indigo create the stark reality of the season. You’d better bundle up for this one!

episodes.name: Desert Glow
episodes.overview: Follow along with Bob Ross as he takes you into the incredible beauty of the dry lands. A unique oval painting for beginners and accomplished artists as well.

episodes.name: Lone Mountain
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross and enjoy a spectacular view -- this painting presents a fabulous lesson in creating rugged and rocky natural surfaces.

episodes.name: Florida's Glory
episodes.overview: Bob Ross presents an intriguing painting with an outline of the ‘sunshine state’, and then creates a lovely beach setting within the borders.

21.name: Season 21
21.overview: Season 21 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Valley View, Tranquil Dawn, Royal Majesty, Serenity, Cabin at Trails End, Mountain Rhapsody, Wilderness Cabin, By the Sea, Indian Summer, Blue Winter, Desert Glow, Lone Mountain, and Florida’s Glory.

episodes.name: Autumn Images
episodes.overview: Feel the soft coolness of late summer air and drink in the beauty of changing colors with Bob Ross as he creates this refreshing masterpiece.

episodes.name: Hint of Springtime
episodes.overview: Melting snow from the mountains creates a rushing flow of water into a valley just awakening for spring. Feel the crisp new season with Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Around the Bend
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross on a painting excursion along this beautiful scenic river – who knows what abundance of nature’s wealth lies beyond!

episodes.name: Countryside Oval
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross to a picturesque spot in the meadow and delight in the discovery of not one, but two serene fishing holes.

episodes.name: Russet Winter
episodes.overview: The first snowfall just beyond autumn signals the true beginning of winter -- join Bob Ross as he discovers just such a glorious moment.

episodes.name: Purple Haze
episodes.overview: Catch a glimpse of the sun trying to break through shades of soft crimson, shining its golden touch upon the land. Bob Ross creates another black canvas beauty today.

episodes.name: Dimensions
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a fantastic and truly unique geometric illusion of depth in today’s lovely vision of pastel mountain magic.

episodes.name: Deep Wilderness Home
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes you far into the untouched forest to discover an old country home on a cliff, completely hidden by surrounding foliage.

episodes.name: Haven in the Valley
episodes.overview: Imagine the peace and serenity of a home in the hollow, sheltered from the snow-covered mountains beyond! Travel with Bob Ross to just such a place.

episodes.name: Wintertime Blues
episodes.overview: Bundle up with artist Bob Ross and peer into the north country in the midst of winter; experience a vision in the coldest of azure tones.

episodes.name: Pastel Seascape
episodes.overview: Feast your eyes on this colorful Bob Ross display of nature’s exciting seashore panorama … beautifully tucked within an oval.

episodes.name: Country Creek
episodes.overview: Team up with Bob Ross and travel back to the days of swimming in that lovely secluded river bend; bring back memories of a forgotten time.

episodes.name: Silent Forest
episodes.overview: Take a leisurely stroll with Bob Ross and gather your thoughts in the quiet misty woodlands; this lovely masterpiece is a great lesson in using the knife.

22.name: Season 22
22.overview: Season 22 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Autumn Images, Hint of Springtime, Around the Bend, Countryside Oval, Russet Winter, Purple Haze, Dimensions, Deep Wilderness Home, Haven in the Valley, Wintertime Blues, Pastel Seascape, Country Creek, and Silent Forest.

episodes.name: Frosty Winter Morn
episodes.overview: Soft, serene and near silent, this Bob Ross painting is simple and elegant, with just a lone cabin nestled comfortably into pillows of snow.

episodes.name: Forest Edge
episodes.overview: Bob Ross transforms a zany looking canvas into a gorgeous, soft wooded scene with radiant sun glowing over opulent trees and bushes.

episodes.name: Mountain Ridge Lake
episodes.overview: Powerful mountains softened with grassy meadows and little evergreens framing a nice shiny mere – this is a lovely Bob Ross masterpiece.

episodes.name: Reflections of Gold
episodes.overview: Magnificent jewels in an oval – this Bob Ross painting highlights countless numbers of colors in nature’s sky and foliage.

episodes.name: Quiet Cove
episodes.overview: Elegant mountain lake, silent and still, reflecting the natural beauty of leafy trees and grasses all around – a pretty Bob Ross creation.

episodes.name: River's Peace
episodes.overview: Autumn is the threshold to winter, but still with glorious color and warmth in Bob Ross’ trees, sky and buttery ground cover.

episodes.name: At Dawn's Light
episodes.overview: A real viewer favorite! With silky shades pink, mauve and lilac, Bob Ross completes an amazing birch tree landscape.

episodes.name: Valley Waterfall
episodes.overview: A regal vista on canvas, Bob Ross paints incredible mountains and waterfall enclosed by proud evergreens and mossy cliffs.

episodes.name: Toward Day's End
episodes.overview: Even the oval in this delightful Bob Ross cabin-by-the-river painting cannot contain all the succulent, glorious foliage!

episodes.name: Falls in the Glen
episodes.overview: A partially blackened canvas is all you need to start creating this dark, mood-filled misty waterfall scene with artist Bob Ross.

episodes.name: Frozen Beauty in Vignette
episodes.overview: A truly graceful scene, as if floating in air -- icy pond and weather-worn cabin -- is today’s Bob Ross winter landscape.

episodes.name: Crimson Tide
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints a breathtakingly beautiful seascape on black canvas today, complete with fierce skies, jagged cliff and raging ocean waves.

episodes.name: Winter Bliss
episodes.overview: A different kind of oval today! – Bob Ross paints a pretty, panoramic cold mountain lake scene inside this fun frame.

23.name: Season 23
23.overview: Season 23 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Frosty Winter Morn, Forest Edge, Mountain Ridge Lake, Reflections of Gold, Quiet Cove, Rivers Peaces, At Dawn’s Light, Valley Waterfall, Toward Days End, Falls in the Glen, Frozen Beauty in Vignette, Crimson Tide, and Winter Bliss.

episodes.name: Gray Mountain
episodes.overview: Bob Ross teams up with Mother Nature and paints an incredibly awesome sky hovering over fantastic, snow-covered mountains and glass-like reflections.

episodes.name: Wayside Pond
episodes.overview: In a densely covered spot hidden far from the nearest roadway lies a softly nestled quiet little pond; Bob Ross invites you to take a peek.

episodes.name: Teton Winter
episodes.overview: A visit with Bob Ross takes you to a secluded cabin, snuggled deep into the blankety drifts of fluffy snow, far into the frozen mountains.

episodes.name: Little Home in the Meadow
episodes.overview: Bob Ross employs some of his well-known oval magic to paint a lovely cabin scene situated in a serene, soft little rolling pasture.

episodes.name: A Pretty Autumn Day
episodes.overview: Bob Ross spills an amazing cornucopia of red, brown, green and gold colors into this gorgeous fall mountain masterpiece – a real audience favorite.

episodes.name: Mirrored Images
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross on a clear windless day, where reflections are so smooth they appear to be crystal likenesses of the mountains above.

episodes.name: Back-Country Path
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes a detour from the trail and discovers a rarely used trail through country woods.

episodes.name: Graceful Waterfall
episodes.overview: Travel deep into the forest with Bob Ross and discover the beauty and serenity of an elegant waterfall.

episodes.name: Icy Lake
episodes.overview: Paint along with Steve Ross as he creates a lovely oval painting, a winter landscape surrounding a frozen lake.

episodes.name: Rowboat on the Beach
episodes.overview: It’s such a tranquil day down at the beach! Join Bob Ross as he paints a lovely little rowboat that awaits its owner’s return.

episodes.name: Portrait of Winter
episodes.overview: Bundle up with Bob Ross and visit the north in the middle of winter! Snow and ice abound in a profusion of beauty.

episodes.name: The Footbridge
episodes.overview: Stroll down to the river and cast your line with Bob Ross from the bridge – join in the fun and paint this masterpiece.

episodes.name: Snowbound Cabin
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes us to an isolated cabin deep in the woods on a cold, snowy winter day.

24.name: Season 24
24.overview: Season 24 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Gray Mountain, Wayside Pond, Teton Winter, Little Home in the Meadow, A Pretty Autumn Day, Mirrored Images, Back-Country Path, Graceful Waterfall, Icy Lake, Rowboat on the Beach, Portrait of Winter, The Footbridge, and Snowbound Cabin.

episodes.name: Hide-A-Way Cove
episodes.overview: Take a stroll with Bob Ross, down to that perfect little fishing spot tucked away from the world, and relish the beauty of the day!

episodes.name: Enchanted Falls Oval
episodes.overview: Create this extraordinary waterfall with Bob Ross and capture its intriguing magic in a painting you’ll be proud to display anywhere.

episodes.name: Not Quite Spring
episodes.overview: The trees have shed their snow and ice has begun to thaw, Spring will arrive soon in the incredibly beautiful Bob Ross landscape.

episodes.name: Splashes of Autumn
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a beautiful golden warm waterfall scene, employing a lovely almost watercolor-looking effect. Come join in the fun!

episodes.name: Summer in the Mountains
episodes.overview: Watch guest artist Steve Ross paint an incredibly beautiful, bright and happy mountain scene with fabulous evergreens and foothills.

episodes.name: Oriental Falls
episodes.overview: In an almost watercolor appearance, Bob Ross paints this amazing secluded waterfall masterpiece with interesting tree and rock formations.

episodes.name: Autumn Palette
episodes.overview: Venture down a well-traveled pathway with Bob Ross, into this gorgeous Autumn landscape of glorious colors, weather worn fence and trees.

episodes.name: Cypress Swamp
episodes.overview: Hidden far from the highways of the South are lovely wetlands teaming with moss-clad trees and birds; Bob Ross shares a rare glimpse of beauty!

episodes.name: Downstream View
episodes.overview: From a quiet spot by this smooth-stoned river, join Bob Ross for a very, very distant view of a lovely snow-covered mountain.

episodes.name: Just Before the Storm
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates a moment in time as the sea finds itself in one of nature’s sudden cloudbursts; experience another oval masterpiece!

episodes.name: Fisherman's Paradise
episodes.overview: In the golden glow of sunrise, join Bob Ross for a refreshing look at early morning where anglers work and thrive – all inside a uniquely framed painting.

episodes.name: Desert Hues
episodes.overview: Dry mountains, spiny shrubs and cacti, take a drive deep into the desert with Bob Ross and enjoy this fantastic oval surprise!

episodes.name: The Property Line
episodes.overview: Bob Ross paints an old gnarly tree and snow-capped fence to mark the line between home and the edge of the winter blanketed forest.

25.name: Season 25
25.overview: Season 25 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Hide A Way Cove, Enchanted Falls Oval, Not Quite Spring, Splashes of Autumn, Summer in the Mountain, Oriental Falls, Autumn Palette, Cypress Swamp, Downstream View, Just Before the Storm, Fisherman’s Paradise, Desert Hues, and The Property Line.

episodes.name: In the Stillness of the Morning
episodes.overview: Take a walk with Bob Ross and experience the quiet motionless beauty of a glassy river as the morning fog hangs onto the distant shore.

episodes.name: Delightful Meadow Home
episodes.overview: Hike into the expanse of wilderness with Bob Ross and happen upon a quaint little home sitting among softly blowing meadow grasses.

episodes.name: First Snow
episodes.overview: Follow Bob Ross into a lovely mountain setting with magnificent evergreens, where the first touches of snow appear in the valley.

episodes.name: Lake in the Valley
episodes.overview: Discover a beautiful quiet lake hidden deep in the wilderness – and just beyond a glorious snow-covered mountain! – from the magical brushes of Bob Ross.

episodes.name: A Trace of Spring
episodes.overview: Stroll along a wonderful hustling, bubbling river with Bob Ross and enjoy the emergence of springtime blossoms on spectacular trees.

episodes.name: An Arctic Winter Day
episodes.overview: Travel to the coldest place imaginable with Bob Ross and find a lonely cabin comfortably nestled on the edge of a glassy-smooth frozen pond.

episodes.name: Snow Birch
episodes.overview: An incredibly unique Bob Ross painting -- delight in the effects of white and black gesso, discover a birch tree forest perfectly mirrored in the cold stillness of winter.

episodes.name: Early Autumn
episodes.overview: Follow along with the brushes of Bob Ross and step into a beautiful mountain oval – experience the first signs of autumn.

episodes.name: Tranquil Wooded Stream
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes you to a lovely spot deep in the woods where the seclusion, silence and beauty offer serenity to the soul.

episodes.name: Purple Mountain Range
episodes.overview: Take a nice walk with Bob Ross along a peacefully flowing river and enjoy a view of gorgeous amethyst mountains and stately trees in the distance.

episodes.name: Storm's a Comin'
episodes.overview: Join artist Bob Ross under turbulent skies as the windy waves rush to crash upon the rocks – all within a pleasing oval shape.

episodes.name: Sunset Aglow
episodes.overview: Find yourself in a gorgeous late-afternoon mountain masterpiece by Bob Ross -- breathtaking purples skies, defined evergreens and smooth lake.

episodes.name: Evening at the Falls
episodes.overview: Sneak away into the cold shadows with Bob Ross and enjoy the beauty of a winter night at the foot of a large fierce waterfall.

26.name: Season 26
26.overview: Season 26 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: In the Stillness of Morning, Delightful Meadow Home, First Snow, Lake in the Valley, A Trace of Spring, An Arctic Winter Day, Snow Birch, Early Autumn, Tranquil Wooded Stream, Purple Mountain Range, Storm’s A Comin, Sunset Aglow, and Evening at the Falls.

episodes.name: Twilight Beauty
episodes.overview: Stand back in the shadows with Bob Ross as the last rays of sunshine sparkle on all they touch in this lovely waterside oval on black canvas.

episodes.name: Angler's Haven
episodes.overview: Visit a lovely mountain setting with Bob Ross, complete with leafy trees and evergreens, and step into a secluded fishing spot just perfect for casting a line.

episodes.name: Rustic Winter Woods
episodes.overview: Hike into the midst of a snow-covered forest with Bob Ross and enjoy the beauty of leafless trees in slumber and texture you can almost feel.

episodes.name: Wilderness Falls
episodes.overview: Relish the tranquility of valley waters gently falling into a quiet summer mere – smooth cliffs and trees frame this Bob Ross wonderland.

episodes.name: Winter at the Farm
episodes.overview: Venture into the heart of Americana with Bob Ross and discover the serenity of a snow-covered farmhouse and barn on a cold January day.

episodes.name: Daisies at Dawn
episodes.overview: A perfect oval composition! Come along with Bob Ross and see a secluded cottage with wild daisies and birch trees near a small woodland pond.

episodes.name: A Spectacular View
episodes.overview: Bob Ross invites you to join him at a quaint little mountain-top home with a breathtaking view of distant snow-covered mountains.

episodes.name: Daybreak
episodes.overview: Join television artist Bob Ross and take a peek through the fog of a snowy morning as the awakening sun enters into a new day.

episodes.name: Island Paradise
episodes.overview: Travel to the tropics with Bob Ross, stroll along the palm tree shores and drink in the soul-cleansing beauty of the sea. An oval masterpiece you’ll enjoy.

episodes.name: Sunlight in the Shadows
episodes.overview: Enjoy guest artist Dana Jester and his dark soft forest; discover the brilliance of the sun’s glow bouncing off a quiet stream and majestic oaks.

episodes.name: Splendor of a Snowy Winter
episodes.overview: Experience the serenity and silence of a fresh undisturbed snowfall with Bob Ross when he takes you to a lovely cabin deep in northern country.

episodes.name: Forest River
episodes.overview: Bob Ross travels with his paint brushes into the density of an evening grove and discovers the beauty of a gentle, hushed rippling river.

episodes.name: Golden Glow of Morning
episodes.overview: Take a stroll into the woods with Bob Ross and experience the reflections of a jeweled sun bursting into the soft, vibrant day.

27.name: Season 27
27.overview: Season 27 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Twilight Beauty, Angler’s Haven, Rustic Winter Woods, Wilderness Falls, Winter at the Farm, Daisies at Dawn, A Spectacular View, Daybreak, Island Paradise, Sunlight in the Shadows, Splendor of a Snowy Winter, Forest River, and Golden Glow of Morning.

episodes.name: Fisherman's Trail
episodes.overview: Fantastic faux woodgrain! Hike into the wilderness with Bob Ross and discover a well worn path leading back to his favorite fishing spot.

episodes.name: A Warm Winter
episodes.overview: Travel into the unknown with Bob Ross and discover the beauty of a lovely cabin, fresh fallen snow and warm, colorful skies in an oval.

episodes.name: Under Pastel Skies
episodes.overview: Look out over the valley lake with Bob Ross and view truly majestic mountains and evergreens under the calm of soft, muted skies.

episodes.name: Golden Rays of Sunshine
episodes.overview: A real Bob Ross favorite – such a unique composition of shadowy forest and delightfully twinkling sunbeams piercing the darkness.

episodes.name: The Magic of Fall
episodes.overview: Walk along an old fence into the autumn country with Bob Ross and rest under the golden branches of a majestic shade tree.

episodes.name: Glacier Lake
episodes.overview: Bundle up with Bob Ross when you visit this towering ice mountain as it protects the misty falls and chilly lake in the valley.

episodes.name: The Old Weathered Barn
episodes.overview: Explore the back woods with Bob Ross and happen upon an old, forgotten shanty hidden away in the densest of undergrowth.

episodes.name: Deep Forest Falls
episodes.overview: Capture an oval vision of tranquility in the forest with Bob Ross; discover a happy waterfall as it empties into a shallow stony stream.

episodes.name: Winter's Grace
episodes.overview: Enter into the realm of the far north with Bob Ross and view first-hand the glory of a cold, cold snow-blanketed wintertime landscape scene.

episodes.name: Splendor of Autumn
episodes.overview: Experience the wonder of a late summer’s day with Bob Ross where shades of lavender and golden, warm fall colors unite in an array of fabulous beauty.

episodes.name: Tranquil Seas
episodes.overview: Stroll along the beach at sunset with Bob Ross and feel the gentle breezes blow as the waves softly kiss the shore in this oval masterpiece.

episodes.name: Mountain Serenity
episodes.overview: Look into the distance with Bob Ross and experience the peace and quiet of a stoic mountain overlooking a smooth-as-glass wilderness lake.

episodes.name: Home Before Nightfall
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes you to a meadow where evening breezes blow upon soft grasses and where you feel warmth from a rustic little cabin.

28.name: Season 28
28.overview: Season 28 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Fisherman’s Trail, A Warm Winter, Under Pastel Skies, Golden Rays of Sunshine, The Magic of Fall, Glacier Lake, The Old Weathered Barn, Deep Forest Falls, Winter’s Grace, Splendor of Autumn, Tranquil Seas, Mountain Serenity, and Home before Nightfall.

episodes.name: Island in the Wilderness
episodes.overview: Take a walk with Bob Ross down a little lakeside path in a secluded place; you’ll delight in the discovery of a small uninhabited island.

episodes.name: Autumn Oval
episodes.overview: Step into an oval classic with Bob Ross and get inspired by the gorgeous browns and oranges of undoubtedly the most beautiful season of all.

episodes.name: Seasonal Progression
episodes.overview: An interesting way to frame two pictures! Bob Ross paints a mountain landscape from luscious summer to beautiful winter, both on one canvas.

episodes.name: Light at the Summit
episodes.overview: Capture a vision of glory with Bob Ross as you view the brilliance of afternoon sunlight peeking over a distant mountain top.

episodes.name: Countryside Barn
episodes.overview: Take a trail through the meadow with Bob Ross and enjoy magnificent warmth and beauty of the sunlight’s glory as it rests gently upon an old barn.

episodes.name: Mountain Lake Falls
episodes.overview: Guest artist Steve Ross invites you to experience the refreshing beauty of a highland lake and its gentle splashing waterfall.

episodes.name: Cypress Creek
episodes.overview: Take a stroll with Bob Ross deep into the swamp and breathe in the fragrances of damp earth and moss-filled trees on a rill bank.

episodes.name: Trapper's Cabin
episodes.overview: Hike into the mountains with Bob Ross and stumble upon a cozy well-worn shack amidst the solitude of the wilderness.

episodes.name: Storm on the Horizon
episodes.overview: Visit this gusty, sandy beach with Bob Ross and see how the approaching menacing clouds hug the great sea and sky ahead.

episodes.name: Pot O' Posies
episodes.overview: Follow guest artist Annette Kowalski as she creates a beautiful hanging clay pot full of leaves and flowers using the Bob Ross painting method.

episodes.name: A Perfect Winter Day
episodes.overview: Travel with Bob Ross to the mountains of the north and marvel at the sight of a quaint cabin nestled into a lovely winter landscape.

episodes.name: Aurora's Dance
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross and experience the amazing beauty of the ‘northern lights’ phenomenon as they dance across the dark, dark sky – this time in an oval!

episodes.name: Woodman's Retreat
episodes.overview: Explore the gorgeous mountain countryside with Bob Ross, and learn to paint a perfectly realistic-looking woodgrain background so simply!

29.name: Season 29
29.overview: Season 29 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: island in the Wilderness, Autumn Oval, Seasonal Progression, Light at the Summit, Countryside Barn, Mountain Lake Falls, Cypress Creek, Trapper’s Cabin, Storm on the Horizon, Pot O’ Posies, A Perfect Winter Day, Aurora’s Dance, and Woodman’s Retreat.

episodes.name: Babbling Brook
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross and experience the magic of early morning in an oval, as gentle trickles and splashes of a happy stream pierce the silence.

episodes.name: Woodgrain View
episodes.overview: Bob Ross creates the illusion of luscious textured wood as you are invited to step into another dimension of mountains overlooking a quiet northern river.

episodes.name: Winter's Peace
episodes.overview: Today Bob Ross paints a warm and elegant snow-kissed scene with a little cabin snuggled deeply into the embrace of foothills, evergreens and bushes.

episodes.name: Wilderness Trail
episodes.overview: Go on a real nature hike with Bob Ross – follow the overgrown path deep in the woods and enjoy the silent beauty of the surrounding stillness.

episodes.name: A Copper Winter
episodes.overview: Step into a snow-covered forest with Bob Ross, a scene that’s been gently warmed by the beauty of winter’s rustic touches of color.

episodes.name: Misty Foothills
episodes.overview: Bob Ross invites you along to enjoy a fabulous mountain lake view with layers of soft hills and trees shrouded in heavy clouded haze.

episodes.name: Through the Window
episodes.overview: A cleverly constructed shape on canvas! Peek through the panes with artist Bob Ross and share a beautiful snowy day outside.

episodes.name: Home in the Valley
episodes.overview: Visit a quaint Bob Ross shanty and experience the tranquility of mysterious distant mountains and an inviting pond just outside the door.

episodes.name: Mountains of Grace
episodes.overview: Join guest artist Steve Ross today -- experience the magnificence of splendid mountains and glassy lake embraced by leafy trees and bushes.

episodes.name: Seaside Harmony
episodes.overview: Roll up your trousers and walk the beach with Bob Ross; enjoy a sky full of clouds and waves crashing carelessly upon the rocks.

episodes.name: A Cold Spring Day
episodes.overview: Painter Bob Ross invites you to enjoy the last of winter’s snowy touch on canvas, as mountains and valleys begin to emerge from their slumber.

episodes.name: Evening's Glow
episodes.overview: Enjoy the golden radiance of a setting sun with Bob Ross as night hastens over a softly blended knoll – you’ll be home at last, just down trail’s end.

episodes.name: Blue Ridge Falls
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross in the mountains of the east, and bask in the breathtaking serenity of a waterfall bubbling and splashing, nestled among the evergreens.

30.name: Season 30
30.overview: Season 30 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Babbling Brook, Woodgrain View, Winter’s Peace, Wilderness Trail, A Copper Winter, Misty Foothills, Through the Window, Home in the Valley, Mountains of Grace, Seaside Harmony, A Cold Spring Day, Evening’s Glow, and Blue Ridge Falls.

episodes.name: Reflections of Calm
episodes.overview: Bob Ross takes you to a beautiful lake in high country -- catch a glimpse of magnificent mountains, images echoed in the crystal clear water below.

episodes.name: Before the Snowfall
episodes.overview: Bob Ross invites you to experience the anticipation of winter’s white blanket, moving in to create a soft, delicate draping of the cabin landscape.

episodes.name: Winding Stream
episodes.overview: Join Bob Ross for a stroll down yonder by the river, relax in the serenity of an expansive yet quiet sky with proud evergreens looking on.

episodes.name: Tranquility Cove
episodes.overview: As the foliage reaches its peak of autumn beauty, experience the tranquility of nice meadow, pond and happy birch trees – all painted the Bob Ross way!

episodes.name: Cabin in the Hollow
episodes.overview: Soft misty background, sweet snow-kissed cabin and rich trees and bushes – all nestled down inside a winter oval painting by Bob Ross.

episodes.name: View from Clear Creek
episodes.overview: Gently rolling mountains make an amazing backdrop for this Bob Ross masterpiece; a winding stream and textured ground vegetation provide the rest.

episodes.name: Bridge to Autumn
episodes.overview: Take a drive into the country with Bob Ross and pass through an old covered bridge into a landscape bursting with soft fall foliage.

episodes.name: Trail's End
episodes.overview: In this oval painting, Bob Ross creates a wonderful scene where an old fence follows a trail to the edge of the woods.

episodes.name: Evergreen Valley
episodes.overview: Drive through mountain country with Bob Ross and happen upon a ridge of thick, rich evergreens gracing the hollow below.

episodes.name: Balmy Beach
episodes.overview: Bob Ross invites you for a walk on the shore; soothing waves rolling in from the sea to the plam trees – all in a delightful seashell shape on canvas.

episodes.name: Lake at the Ridge
episodes.overview: Guest artist Steve Ross extends an invitation to join him on the banks of a crystal loch for a view of majestic mountain peaks.

episodes.name: In the Midst of Winter
episodes.overview: It’s a cold, cold winter day but Bob Ross offers a warm and roomy barn as refuge from the snowy blanket covering the farm.

episodes.name: Wilderness Day
episodes.overview: Step into the natural beauty of an overgrown colorful mead and enjoy the peace and soft tranquility you get from Bob Ross’ painting technique.

31.name: Season 31
31.overview: Season 31 of The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross features the following wonderful painting instructions: Reflections of Calm, Before the Snowfall, Winding Stream, Tranquility Cove, Cabin in the Hollow, View from Clear Creek, Bridge to Autumn, Trail’s End, Evergreen Valley, Balmy Beach, Lake at the Ridge, In the Midst of Winter, and Wilderness Day.
